name.en: Introduction of Disaster Prevention and Response

goal.en: "Course material includes an introduction to the concepts and fundamentals of disaster prevention and response. The course will introduce disasters, the government’s prevention systems and related legislations. Through lectures, Internship and final projects in class, students can have the knowledge and skills in different fields and extend to their fields of research."
goal.ch: 本課程依國家公職人員中「災害防救」職系職務選才所設定，學生在此課程中將會學習到「災害防救」領域工作基礎知能，並可關聯於土木工程於防災上的應用。

content.en:
"The course syllabus is as follows:
 Introduction of disasters
 Disaster Management
 The Government’s Disaster Rescue System
 Disaster Prevention and Response Act
 Disaster Risk
 Hazard Map
 Information for Disasters
 Emergency Evacuation"
content.ch:
"課程大綱如下
 災害概述
 災害管理機制
 災害防救體系
 災害防救法與災害防救計畫
 災害風險、災害潛勢分析與境況模擬
 防災地圖
 災害防救資訊
 疏散避難與收容
 社區防災"

textbook.ch: "1. 授課教師準備的講義。 2. 李秉乾、楊龍士、陳昶憲等人(2019)。《災害管理實務》。臺北：五南。 3. 王价巨、馬士元、張賢龢(2017)。《災害管理：13堂專業的必修課程》。臺北：五南。"

grading.en: "Practice 30% Midterm Exam 30% Project Proposal 10% Final Project and oral presentation 30%"
grading.ch: "實作/實驗: 30% 期中測驗: 30% 專案計畫書:10% 期末專案書面與口頭報告: 30%"
